entry.title: NOWLY SNOW BOOTS IN CAMEL
entry.summary:
Vendor: ISABEL MARANT
Type: BOOTS
Price: 985.00

Isabel Marant's 'Derst' boots are made from smooth suede and have sleek pointed toes. Set on low conical heels, they're perfect for wearing with everything from distressed jeans to flowy midi skirts.

  • Details: Fold down collar, chikka boots, lace up closure, rubber sole, additional laces included, hidden wedge
  • Material: Cowhide + Dyed sheep shearling
  • Item fits true to size, available in whole sizes only, if you wear a half size go up to the next whole size
  • Heel Height: Platform is 1", Heel height is 2"
  • Imported

entry.title: TREKKY SANDAL IN FLYNN
entry.summary:
Vendor: XIRENA
Type: SANDAL
Price: 87.00

Introducing the XÍRENA x Arizona Love Trekky Sandals in Fynn (Fire + Water). Put your best foot forward in these exclusive cotton gauze mix and match prints from our Spring 2021 collection. Handmade and handcrafted with adjustable velcro ankle straps and soft cushion soles.

Fit & Sizing
Foot notes... whole sizes only. Fit runs small. We say take one size up (or two for half sizes).

Fabric & Care
Wrap It Up - AX11901
100% EVA soles. 100% Cotton upper. 100% Polyester thread. Spot clean only.

Designed in Los Angeles.

*all sale items are final sale*

entry.title: RUBBER CITY BOOT IN BLACK
entry.summary:
Vendor: GANNI
Type: BOOTS
Price: 345.00

Recycled rubber ankle boots with elastic chelsea-style panels and tab details. Style with a hooded knit and mini skirt. These boots are made from a blend of recycled rubber and are not water proof.

  • Fit true to size
  • Comfortable, 4 cm platform/flat sole
  • Chunky, ribbed, rubber soles
  • Round toe
  • Chelsea style, slip on with elastic and front/back pull-tabs
  • Matte, leather-look 50% recycled rubber + 50% rubber material
  • Made in Portugal


50% RECYCLED RUBBER
These styles are made from 50% pre-consumer recycled rubber – the scraps and cut-offs from the production of rubber shoes.
Pre-consumer means the elements that would usually be treated as waste, are reused in production again.
